runs.comm: short of a good length, on the off stump, coming in a touch after pitching, that one goes right through Gautam Gambhir, who defends awkwardly. Appeal for something but it's too high for the lbw and didn't hit bat.
fullish and just slipping down leg, Gambhir shapes to flick and misses, off the pads to the leg side
once again a touch too straight, hint of swing here for Pollock, Gambhir gets across his stumps and flicks the ball away through square-leg and India are off the mark
short of a good length and on the off, defended town towards the off side with an angled bat
too full once again and slipping down leg but once again Pollock gets away with it as Gambhir flicks and misses. Hit on the pads.
short of a good length and outside the off, Sehwag has a tentative prod, the ball shapes away nicely, and late, and beats the bat and goes through to the keeper
back of a length, outside the off, slanting away from the left-handed Gambhir, the ball goes away further after pitching and is easily called a wide
back of a length once more and pitching on off and middle, Gambhir is forced to play at it but the ball goes away with the angle and beats the bat
short of a length and outside the off once more - that's going to be the length for the moment - defended down to the off side
too full, on the pads, Ntini overcompensating here, that's just too straight and Gambhir can walk across his stumps and just tickle the ball down to the fine-leg boundary
short of a length and outside the off, this one is slanting well away and Gambhir can leave it alone to the keeper
outside the off and fairly full, Gambhir has time to move across and time the ball through point for a boundary. That should relieve some of the pressure that is building steadily here.
short of a good length and outside the off stump, Sehwag thumps that one off the back foot but can't beat the infield
very full and on the pads, Sehwag flicks wristily through midwicket, won't go all the way but some runs on offer
good-length ball outside the off, Sehwag opens the face of the bat and runs the ball down to third-man
overpitched and just outside the off. Gambhir tries to hit it really hard through cover but the placement isn't quite there
back of a good length and outside the off. Gambhir takes a massive swipe across the line at this one. It's a thick outside edge and the ball goes past the lone slip fielder down to third-man
short of a good length and close to the off stump, a bit of pace on that one. Left alone to the keeper
very full and on the off stump. Sehwag gets quickly across to the off side and uses his wrists as much as he can to whip that through square-leg. That is a quality shot for four

This one keeps low! Outside the off and it just rolls along the ground to the keeper. This pitch is going to be pretty tough to bat on. Sehwag plays and misses outside the off and the ball goes through to the keeper

short one dug in, it's the first we've seen so far, Gambhir goes for the pull. He's very late on the shot and the ball goes high rather than far. Vernon Philander goes for the ball but doesn't even get close at midwicket
fullish and on the off, better length that, Gambhir tries to play to off, squared up a touch, off the edge towards cover
this one is well down the leg side and Gambhir leaves it well alone for the umpire to call it a wide
overpitched and on the leg stump, Gambhir flicks well but can't beat the diving fielder at short fine-leg
short of a good length and on the stumps, slanting in to Sehwag, he dabs the ball to the on side with soft hands and pinches a quick single
fullish and outside the off, played down to third-man for a single
short of a length and outside the off stump, Gambhir slashes that down wide of third-man for a single
fullish and on the pads, Sehwag once again is quick to go across and dab the ball away to the leg side for runs

Gone! India lose their first one. It's Gambhir who falls. He comes down the pitch and tries to heave the ball over the on side. He can't quite get hold of it and the ball goes up in the air. This time the fielder calls it - it's Graeme Smith - and settles under a catch at mid-off after running a few yards.
overpitched and on the pads, Sehwag once again has no trouble working the ball away through the on-side

Another! Dinesh Karthik falls! That was a rather uncontrolled shot first up. Pollock pitches one up on the pads and Karthik flicks lazily. The ball loops up in the air and straight into Albie Morkel's hands at square-leg. Karthik didn't even try to hit that one especially hard. Now that's put India in a spot of bother after a reasonably good start on a tricky pitch.

On fire! It's Sehwag gone now and India are in deep, deep trouble here. That was a soft dismissal after an extremely promising start from Sehwag. That was short of a length and outside the off, Sehwag plays away from his body without much conviction, trying to steer the ball through the off side and only manages an edge. Mark Boucher pouches the catch.
short of a length and outside the off, tentatively played at and missed
short of a good length once more and on the off, played off the back foot down to point
quite full this time and on the stumps, Sharma walks across and works the ball down to fine-leg
just short of a driving length and on the off, Uthappa comes across and defends down to the off side

fullish and on the off, this one is quick from Ntini, the ball slants in and Uthappa goes forward and across in defense. The ball comes off the edge and hits pad and there's a loud shout for the lbw. Turned down by Taufel.
fullish and quite straight, Sharma just plays the ball to the on side and sets off for a single
fullish and on the stumps once more, Uthappa walks across and flicks. It's uppish but in the gap and timed quite well. The ball runs down to midwicket
short of a driving length and on the off, defended a touch awkwardly towards the off side
short of a driving length and on the off, Pollock hitting a good line and length here, defended back down the pitch
short of a good length and outside the off, Uthappa walks well across and gets outside the line and tries to flick. There's an appeal for the lbw but that's clearly not out.

full and on the off, driven back to the bowler. End of an excellent spell from Pollock. This is more like the Pollock we know in international cricket. In previous games he's been taken for quite a few runs by some of the lesser lights of world batting. Here, on his home ground, Pollock has put in a solid performance.
short of a good length and outside the off, exaggerated movement off the pitch, played at and missed, through to the keeper
short of a length and outside the off, Sharma opens the face of the bat and plays the ball down to third-man
short one banged in by van Der Wath, hook shot played and missed, through to the keeper
short of a good length and outside the off, eased through the vacant gully region for runs
short of a good length and on the stumps, pull played off the front foot, not timed too well, just a single
another short one banged in. Uthappa sees this one really early and is in position in a flash. Aggressive front-foot pull and this is sweetly struck. The ball sails into the stands over midwicket
short of a good length and outside the off, Rohit Sharma advances down the pitch and tries to hit that over cover. He doesn't get anywhere near that one.
short of a good length and outside the off, Rohit Sharma feels for that outside the off and misses
very full and just slanting onto leg stump, Sharma defends a touch awkwardly back down the pitch
full and straight, Sharma drives nicely off the front foot but he can neither get timing or placement right and only finds the man at mid-off. Runs hard to come by here. Something's got to give ...
just short of a good length and on the off, run down to third-man with an angled bat
fullish and on the stumps, placed just wide of mid-on for a quick single

short one banged in outside the off stump, Uthappa goes for another front-foot pull. The ball balloons up towards mid-on. Vernon Philander drops a clanger. He just doesn't watch the ball properly and lets it pop out of his hand. Graeme Smith is not amused. That was a sitter
short of a good length and on the stumps, played back down the pitch to the bowler
fullish and on the stumps, Sharma gives himself some room and drives down to long-off
short of a good length and outside the off stump, out comes the pull and it's hit in front of square. It's not timed too well but still has enough on it to go all the way.
Down the pitch and bang. Sharma goes for this one, clouting it over cover. It's not terribly pretty but at the moment it's working
bowled full and fast on off stump, Uthappa squeezes it out towards point
banged in short on off and middle stump, Uthappa stands on the front foot and aims to pull over midwicket, the top-edge flies over Boucher for four more, streaky

caught! Uthappa takes a step down the pitch and tries to loft Morkel down the ground, he doesn't get the necessary elevation and hits it straight to Smith at mid-off, India are in massive amounts of trouble
Dhoni pushes hard at one that angles into him from off stump and gets an outside edge to third man
that one rose sharply from a good length and beats Rohit Sharma's front foot drive, he was no where close to making contact
Sharma drives the final ball of the over back to Morkel who swoops down and threatens to fire the throw back at the batsman's end
bowls full on middle stump, dug out towards mid-on for a single
Sharma moves on to the front foot and drives the ball firmly to long-on, that was well-timed
how did that miss off stump? Dhoni tried to drive off the back foot but the ball kept low from a good length and cut into Dhoni, beating him between bat and pad
this one takes off and flies over Dhoni and Boucher's head for four wides
driven off the front foot to cover
short of a length outside off stump, Dhoni waits on the back foot and cuts to deep cover for two more
full and straight on middle stump, driven towards long-on for a single, van der Wath does the fielding
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
defended towards mid-off, the pressure is building on India
Dhoni moves across his stumps and flicks through square leg
Sharma backs away to make room and square drives the ball uppishly but wide of Gibbs who dives to his right at point, the ball beats him and races to the boundary
the ball hits the pads for a leg bye behind square
good-length delivery on off stump, Dhoni leans forward and drives to long off
he begins with a full ball on off stump, Dhoni strides forward and drives powerfully but cannot beat Smith at mid-off
Dhoni waits on the back foot for a good length ball to reach him and opens the face to run the ball to Morne Morkel at third man
defended towards extra cover on the back foot
Dhoni eases on to the front foot and drives a full ball to Smith's left at mid-off, Smith moves quickly and dives to cut of off
Sharma flicks a full toss off his toes to fine leg where Morkel dives over the ball and concedes a boundary, Smith is livid
what elegance! Sharma gets a good stride forward and plays a text-book cover drive all the way to the cover boundary, superbly timed and precisely placed
short of a length on off stump, angling into the right-hander, Dhoni waits on the back foot and defends to cover

dropped! Dhoni flat bats the ball off the front foot down to long-on where Morne Morkel came charging in off the line to take the catch, he loses the ball in the lights and suddenly realises that he's run too far forward, the ball bounces past him and goes for four
driven firmly off the front foot to cover
defended off the back foot to point

another one falls safe, Dhoni tries to pull but lobs the ball safely into the region that would have been occupied by backward short leg in a Test match, both Boucher and the bowler went for it but neither got there in time
driven firmly through covers off the front foot
Sharma defends to cover off the front foot
Sharma backs away and has a wild pull at a good length ball that almost shaves off stump, close call for Sharma
Philander bangs it in short but the ball climbs too high, Boucher has to leap high and take it one-handed
full toss on off stump, Sharma made room and drove it firmly but couldn't beat Smith at mid off
Philander bowls a slow bouncer which Sharma tries to pull but mis-hits towards square leg, the single brings up the 100
driven hard off the front foot for a single to long off
low full toss on off stump, Sharma tries to play it through point but gets a bottom edge back to the bowler
Dhoni backs away and hammers a length ball to de Villiers at cover who dives to his left and stops the ball which is travelling at a rapid pace
Sharma backs away and slices the ball high over point, there's no fielder in the deep and the ball trickles over the ropes
Morne bowls a bouncer which is too quick for Dhoni to pull, he gets a top edge and once again it flies over Boucher for four
Dhoni backs away towards leg but Morkel follows him, somehow Dhoni manages to drive powerfully through cover, Ntini makes a one-handed pick-up on the boundary
that's massive, Dhoni picks up a full ball from middle stump and smashes it over deep midwicket, that's only the second six of the innings and India will be thrilled
that's the third one! van der Wath bowls a low full toss on middle stump, Sharma moves his front foot out of the way, gets under the ball and smashes it over deep midwicket
Sharma moves towards the off side and tries to scoop a full toss over Boucher, he gets an edge towards short fine leg
full and wide outside off stump, Dhoni reaches out for it and powers the ball through cover
Sharma skips towards leg stump, makes room to free his arms and slices the ball over backward point, there's no fielder in the deep there and he's picked his spot perfectly
once again he backs away towards leg stump but he moved too early, van der Wath saw him and bowled it full and wide outside off to beat the bat
he's trying too much now, Sharma tries to move towards off and scoop the ball over the wicketkeeper, once again it's too full and the shot doesn't come off
Dhoni winds up and tries to send the ball into orbit but Morkel is far too quick for him, the short ball flies past the bat
full and straight from Morkel, not letting Dhoni get under the ball, driven to long on for one
Sharma makes room and squeezes a full ball down to third man for one
that's a front-foot no-ball from Morkel which Dhoni latches on to and smashes for four through midwicket, free hit coming up
Dhoni tries to pull the short ball but gets an outside edge that falls in the direction of cover
Sharma's backing away is becoming predictable now, Morne beats him with a short ball outside off stump
he ends the over with a superb yorker, Sharma can't do much with that, he tries to run a leg bye but Morne gets to the ball quickly
van der Wath bowls a full ball outside off stump that squeezes under Dhoni's bat as he tries to cut the ball behind point
full ball on off stump, driven hard into the ground and the ball bounces over the head of the bowler for two runs to long-off
that's length from van der Wath and Dhoni capitalises by rocking back and launching it over midwicket, the ball bounces once before going over the boundary

it's all happening! Dhoni flashed hard outside the off stump and edged it to Boucher who went for it with one hand, the ball popped out and he fumbled the second attempt as well, the batsmen had run the single and tried to steal the second while Boucher rued the dropped chance, Philander realised what was happening and threw the stumps down at the batsman's end with Dhoni an inch short
short ball outside off stump, Pathan tries to pull but gets beaten, Sharma calls him through for the bye, Boucher rolls it at the stumps but misses

what a finish! van der Wath bowls a high full toss, Sharma gets on to the front foot and pulls the ball high and far over the square-leg boundary, he's reached his 50 with that stroke, it's been an excellent innings from the youngster on a trying pitch
